author: dreid
msg: Bring BeOS back into line with Ben's changes to the network API.

author: bjh
msg: Enhancements for APR network_io. Adds separate local/remote access methods for
a socket's port, IP address and sockaddr_in.
Updates for Apache code to use these, allowing the correct IP address of

author: bjh
msg: Don't try to compile mmap functions if the platform doesn't have mmap.

author: bjh
msg: Make a single APR library file.

author: martin
msg: The readdir_r() function in Linux does return with a zero return
even when end-of-file was reached and dir->entry was set to NULL.
Handle this situation graefully and "fake" an EOF condition.
(This modification was required to get mod_speling running).
